abstract: 3M Company reports weaker-than-expected quarterly earnings, sending company shares down 6.25 percent; net income was $1.09 billion, or $1.52 a share, compared with $1.1 billion, or $1.53 a share, a year earlier.
snippet: The company reported net income of $1.09 billion, or $1.52 a share. Analysts on average had expected $1.61 a share.
lead_paragraph: The company reported net income of $1.09 billion, or $1.52 a share. Analysts on average had expected $1.61 a share.

headline.main: 3M Misses Earnings Outlook, and Forecasts Lower Demand
headline.print_headline: 3M Misses Earnings Outlook, And Forecasts Lower Demand
headline.seo: 3M Misses Expectations and Forecasts Slower Growth
